resources.string: We need to set some things up
Before you can use OpenIZ you need to configure it. First, you\'ll need to join this app to an OpenIZ and setup some security controls.
In order for this applet to function, it first must be joined to an OpenIZ Realm. A realm is an OpenIZ application cluster which stores data, security settings, etc.
